trans-unit.source: Helps to secure another implementation of <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref> by wrapping the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref> object and restricting the resources that the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref> has access to.
trans-unit.target: 다른 구현을 보호 하는 데 도움이 <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref> 래핑하여는 <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref> 개체 리소스를 제한할 하는 내부 <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref> 에 액세스할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> class is the default resolver for all classes in the <xref:System.Xml> namespace.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>클래스는 모든 클래스에 대 한 기본 해결 프로그램은 <xref:System.Xml>네임 스페이스.</xref:System.Xml> </xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>

trans-unit.source: It is used to load XML documents and to resolve external resources such as entities, DTDs or schemas, and import or include directives.
trans-unit.target: XML 문서를 로드 하 고 엔터티, Dtd 또는 스키마와 같은 외부 리소스를 확인 하 고 가져오기 또는 지시문을 포함 하는 데 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: You can override this default by specifying the <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> object to use.
trans-unit.target: 지정 하 여이 기본값을 재정의할 수는 <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>사용할 개체입니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to restrict the resources that the underlying <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> can access, you can use an XmlSecureResolver object.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어, 리소스를 제한 하려는 경우는 내부 <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>액세스할 수 있는, XmlSecureResolver 개체를 사용할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>

trans-unit.source: XmlSecureResolver wraps around a concrete implementation of <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> and restricts the resources that the underlying <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> has access to.
trans-unit.target: XmlSecureResolver의 구체적 구현으로 줄 바꿈됩니다 <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>하 고 리소스를 제한 하는 내부 <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>에 액세스할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> </xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>

trans-unit.source: For example, XmlSecureResolver has the ability to prohibit cross-domain redirection, which occurs from an embedded Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) reference.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 XmlSecureResolver에는 포함 된 식별자 URI (Uniform Resource) 참조에서 발생 하는 도메인 간 리디렉션 금지 하는 기능이 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: When you construct an XmlSecureResolver object, you provide a valid <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> implementation along with a URL, an instance of an evidence object, or a permission set, which is used by the XmlSecureResolver to determine security.
trans-unit.target: 제공한 유효한 XmlSecureResolver 개체를 생성할 때 <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>증거 개체 또는 보안을 결정 하는 XmlSecureResolver에 사용 되는 사용 권한 집합의 인스턴스는 URL 따라 구현.</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>

trans-unit.source: Either a <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet?displayProperty=fullName> is generated or the existing one is used and <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is called on it to help secure the underlying <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>.
trans-unit.target: 중 하나는 <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet?displayProperty=fullName>생성 또는 사용 하는 기존 및 <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>가 호출 보안을 유지 하려면 기본 <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> </xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.PermissionSet?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > XmlSecureResolver objects can contain sensitive information such as user credentials.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > XmlSecureResolver 개체는 사용자 자격 증명과 같은 중요 한 정보를 포함할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: You should be careful when caching XmlSecureResolver objects and should not pass the XmlSecureResolver object to an untrusted component.
trans-unit.target: XmlSecureResolver 개체 캐싱과 XmlSecureResolver 개체 신뢰할 수 없는 구성 요소에 전달 하지 않아야 하는 경우 주의 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > There are differences in the security infrastructure for code running on the .NET Framework common language runtime (CLR) and for code running on the CLR that is integrated within Microsoft SQL Server 2005.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] >.NET Framework 공용 언어 런타임 (CLR)에서 실행 되는 코드에 대 한 및 Microsoft SQL Server 2005 내에서 통합 된 CLR에서 실행 되는 코드에 대 한 보안 인프라에는 차이점이 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: This can lead to cases where code developed for the .NET Framework CLR operates differently when used on the SQL Server integrated CLR.
trans-unit.target: SQL Server에서 사용할 때.NET Framework CLR 다르게 작동 하기 위해 개발 하는 코드는 CLR를 통합 하는 경우 발생할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: One of these differences affects the XmlSecureResolver class when you have evidence that is based on a URL (that is, when you use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.CreateEvidenceForUrl%28System.String%29> method or the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%2A> constructor).
trans-unit.target: URL을 기반으로 하는 분명 때 XmlSecureResolver 클래스를에 적용 되며 이러한 차이점 중 하나 (즉, 사용 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.CreateEvidenceForUrl%28System.String%29>메서드 또는 <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%2A>생성자).</xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.CreateEvidenceForUrl%28System.String%29>

trans-unit.source: The policy resolution mechanism of the SQL Server integrated CLR does not use the <xref:System.Security.Policy.Url> or <xref:System.Security.Policy.Zone> information.
trans-unit.target: 정책 확인 메커니즘의 SQL Server CLR 통합을 사용 하지 않습니다는 <xref:System.Security.Policy.Url>또는 <xref:System.Security.Policy.Zone>정보.</xref:System.Security.Policy.Zone> </xref:System.Security.Policy.Url>

trans-unit.source: Instead, it grants permissions based on the GUID that the server adds when assemblies are loaded.
trans-unit.target: 대신 어셈블리를 로드할 때 서버를 추가 하는 GUID를 기반으로 하는 권한을 부여 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When you use the XmlSecureResolver in the SQL Server integrated CLR, provide any required evidence directly by using a specified <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>.
trans-unit.target: CLR 통합에서 XmlSecureResolver SQL Server에서 사용 하는 경우,에 지정 된 <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> 를 사용 하 여 직접 필요한 증명 정보를 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: To use a secure resolver 1.
trans-unit.target: 보안 확인자 1을 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Create an XmlSecureResolver with the correct permission set.
trans-unit.target: 올바른 권한 집합으로는 XmlSecureResolver를 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: Create an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings> object that uses the XmlSecureResolver object.
trans-unit.target: 만들기는 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings>XmlSecureResolver 개체를 사용 하는 개체입니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings>

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#5a](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_1.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#5a](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_1.cs)] 3.
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples #5a](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_1.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples #5a](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_1.cs) ] 3입니다.

trans-unit.source: Pass the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings> object to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A> method when you're creating the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object.
trans-unit.target: 전달 된 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings>개체를 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A>메서드를 작성할 때는 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>개체입니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings>

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#5b](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_2.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#5b](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_2.cs)] ## To restrict access by using a URL Use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.String%29> constructor to create an XmlSecureResolver object that is allowed to access your local intranet site only.
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samplesb](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_2.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samplesb](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_2.cs) ] # # URL 사용 하 여 액세스를 제한 하는 <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.String%29>생성자가 로컬 인트라넷 사이트에만 액세스할 수 있는 XmlSecureResolver 개체를 만듭니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.String%29>

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#3](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_3.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#3](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_3.cs)] ## To restrict access by using a permission set 1.
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples #3](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_3.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples #3](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_3.cs) ] # # 사용 권한을 사용 하 여 액세스를 제한 하려면 1을 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Create a <xref:System.Net.WebPermission> object.
trans-unit.target: 만들기는 <xref:System.Net.WebPermission>개체입니다.</xref:System.Net.WebPermission>

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4a](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_4.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4a](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_4.cs)] 2.
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples #4a](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_4.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples #4a](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_4.cs) ] 2입니다.

trans-unit.source: Specify the URLs that you want to allow access to.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 액세스를 허용 하려는 하는 Url을 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4b](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_5.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4b](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_5.cs)] 3.
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples #4b](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_5.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples #4b](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_5.cs) ] 3입니다.

trans-unit.source: Add the web permissions to the <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> object.
trans-unit.target: 에 웹 권한을 추가 <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>개체입니다.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4c](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_6.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4c](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_6.cs)] 4.
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[C# 4 XmlSecureResolver_Samples](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_6.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples #4 c](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_6.cs) ] 4입니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.Security.PermissionSet%29> constructor to create an XmlSecureResolver object by using the permission set.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.Security.PermissionSet%29>생성자 사용 권한 집합을 사용 하 여 XmlSecureResolver 개체를 만들려고 합니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.Security.PermissionSet%29>

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4d](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_7.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4d](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_7.cs)] See the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%2A> reference page for another example.
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples d](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_7.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples d](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_7.cs) ] 참조는 <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%2A>또 다른 예에 대 한 참조 페이지.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: To restrict access by using evidence You can restrict access by using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.Security.Policy.Evidence%29> constructor and specifying <xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence>.
trans-unit.target: 증거를 사용 하 여 액세스를 제한 하는 <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.Security.Policy.Evidence%29>생성자와 <xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence>.</xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence> 지정</xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.Security.Policy.Evidence%29> 을 사용 하 여 액세스를 제한할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence> is used to create the <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> that is applied to the underlying <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence> <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>기본 <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> 에 적용 되는</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> 만드는 데 사용 되</xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence> 는

trans-unit.source: The XmlSecureResolver calls <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A> on the created <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> before opening any resources.
trans-unit.target: XmlSecureResolver 호출 <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A>에 만들어진 <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>모든 리소스를 열기 전에.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> </xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: Here are some common scenarios and the type of evidence to provide for each: - If you are working in a fully trusted environment, use your assembly to create the evidence: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_8.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_8.cs)] - If you are working in a semi-trusted environment, you have code or data coming from an outside source, and you know the origin of the outside source and have a verifiable URI, use the URI to create the evidence: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_9.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_9.cs)] - If you are working in a semi-trusted environment and you have code or data coming from an outside source, but you don't know the origin of the outside source, either: Set the `evidence` parameter to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 다음은 몇 가지 일반적인 시나리오와 각각에 대해 제공할 증명 정보 형식:-완전히 신뢰할 수 있는 환경에서 작업 하는 경우 어셈블리를 사용 하 여 증명 정보를 만듭니다: [!code-vb [XmlSecureResolver_Samples](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_8.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_8.cs) ] -부분 신뢰 환경에서 작업 하는, 코드 또는 데이터를 외부 소스에서 들어오는 있고 외부 소스의 출처를 알고 있으며 확인 가능한 URI가 URI를 사용 하 여 증명 정보를 만듭니다: [!code-vb [XmlSecureResolver_Samples](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_9.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_9.cs) ] 부분 신뢰 환경에서 작업 하는 및를 외부 소스에서 가져온 코드나 데이터가 있지만 경우 알 수 없는 외부 소스의 출처 하거나-: 설정의 `evidence` 매개 변수를 `null`합니다.

trans-unit.source: This allows no access to resources.
trans-unit.target: 그러면 리소스에 액세스할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: -or- If your application requires some access to resources, request evidence from the caller.
trans-unit.target: -또는-응용 프로그램의 리소스에 액세스 해야 하는 경우 호출자의 증명 정보를 요청 합니다.

trans-unit.source: To use the secure resolver to load an XSLT style sheet 1.
trans-unit.target: 확인자를 사용 보안 1 XSLT 스타일 시트를 로드 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Create an XmlSecureResolver with the correct permission set.
trans-unit.target: 올바른 권한 집합으로는 XmlSecureResolver를 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: Pass the XmlSecureResolver to the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: XmlSecureResolver에 전달 된 <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A>

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#6](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_10.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#6](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_10.cs)]
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[#6 XmlSecureResolver_Samples](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_10.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples ](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_10.cs)]

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref> class with the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref> and <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> specified.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref> 클래스와 <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref> 및 <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The XML resolver that is wrapped by the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 래핑된 XML 확인자는 <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The permission set to apply to the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 사용 권한 집합 내부에 적용할 <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref> calls the <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method on the permission set before calling the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity*> method on the underlying XML resolver.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref> 호출은 <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 권한 호출 하기 전에 집합에 대 한 메서드는 <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity*>메서드 내부 XML 확인자를.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref> class with the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref> and <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Evidence"></xref> specified.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref> 클래스와 <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref> 및 <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Evidence"> </xref> 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Here are some possible scenarios and the type of evidence to provide for each scenario: - If you are working in a fully trusted environment, use your assembly to create the evidence: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/74601da4-12bd-44fe-a117-_1.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/74601da4-12bd-44fe-a117-_1.cs)] - If you are working in a semi-trusted environment, you have code or data coming from an outside source, and you know the origin of the outside source and have a verifiable URI, use the URI to create the evidence: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/74601da4-12bd-44fe-a117-_2.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/74601da4-12bd-44fe-a117-_2.cs)] - If you are working in a semi-trusted environment and you have code or data coming from an outside source, but you don't know the origin of the outside source, either: Set the `evidence` parameter to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 다음은 몇 가지 가능한 시나리오와 각 시나리오에 대해 제공할 증명 정보 형식:-완전히 신뢰할 수 있는 환경에서 작업 하는 경우 어셈블리를 사용 하 여 증명 정보를 만듭니다: [!code-vb [XmlSecureResolver_Samples](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/74601da4-12bd-44fe-a117-_1.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/74601da4-12bd-44fe-a117-_1.cs) ] -부분 신뢰 환경에서 작업 하는, 코드 또는 데이터를 외부 소스에서 들어오는 있고 외부 소스의 출처를 알고 있으며 확인 가능한 URI가 URI를 사용 하 여 증명 정보를 만듭니다: [!code-vb [XmlSecureResolver_Samples](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/74601da4-12bd-44fe-a117-_2.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/74601da4-12bd-44fe-a117-_2.cs) ] 부분 신뢰 환경에서 작업 하는 및를 외부 소스에서 가져온 코드나 데이터가 있지만 경우 알 수 없는 외부 소스의 출처 하거나-: 설정의 `evidence` 매개 변수를 `null`합니다.

trans-unit.source: This allows no access to resources.
trans-unit.target: 그러면 리소스에 액세스할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: -or- If your application requires some access to resources, request evidence from the caller.
trans-unit.target: -또는-응용 프로그램의 리소스에 액세스 해야 하는 경우 호출자의 증명 정보를 요청 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The XML resolver that is wrapped by the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 래핑된 XML 확인자는 <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The evidence used to create the <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> that will be applied to the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 만드는 데 사용한 증거는 <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> 내부에 적용 될 <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref> calls the <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method on the created <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> before calling <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity*> on the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref> 호출은 <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 메서드를 만든 <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> 호출 하기 전에 <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity*>은 기본 <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref> class with the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref> and URL provided.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref> 클래스와 <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref> 및 제공 된 URL입니다.

trans-unit.source: The XML resolver that is wrapped by the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 래핑된 XML 확인자는 <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The URL used to create the <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> that will be applied to the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: URL을 만드는 데 사용 된 <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> 내부에 적용 될 <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref> calls <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> on the created <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> before calling <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity*> on the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref> 호출 <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 에 만들어진 <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> 호출 하기 전에 <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity*>은 기본 <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity*>

trans-unit.source: Creates evidence using the supplied URL.
trans-unit.target: 제공된 된 URL을 사용 하 여 증명 정보를 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: The URL used to create the evidence.
trans-unit.target: 증거를 만드는 데 URL입니다.

trans-unit.source: The evidence generated from the supplied URL as defined by the default policy.
trans-unit.target: 기본 정책에 의해 정의 된 대로 제공된 된 URL에서 생성 된 증명 정보입니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets credentials used to authenticate web requests.
trans-unit.target: 웹 요청을 인증 하는 데 사용 되는 자격 증명을 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The credentials to be used to authenticate web requests.
trans-unit.target: 웹 요청을 인증 하는 데 사용할 자격 증명입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref> sets the given credentials on the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref> 지정된 된 자격 증명은 기본 설정 <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If this property is not set, the value defaults to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>; that is, the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref> has no user credentials.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은이 속성을 설정 하지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, 즉는 <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref> 에 사용자 자격 증명이 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Maps a URI to an object that contains the actual resource.
trans-unit.target: 실제 리소스가 포함 된 개체로 URI를 매핑합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method temporarily sets the <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> created in the constructor by calling <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> before calling <xref uid="langword_csharp_GetEntity" name="GetEntity" href=""></xref> on the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref> to open the resource.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 일시적으로 설정는 <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> 생성자에서 호출 하 여 만든 <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 호출 하기 전에 <xref uid="langword_csharp_GetEntity" name="GetEntity" href=""> </xref> 은 기본 <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref> 리소스를 엽니다.

trans-unit.source: The URI that is returned from <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.ResolveUri*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.ResolveUri*>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.ResolveUri*> 에서 반환 되는 URI

trans-unit.source: Currently not used.
trans-unit.target: 현재 사용 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The type of object to return.
trans-unit.target: 반환할 개체의 형식입니다.

trans-unit.source: The current version only returns <xref:System.IO.Stream> objects.
trans-unit.target: 현재 버전에만 반환 <xref:System.IO.Stream>개체입니다.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The stream returned by calling <xref uid="langword_csharp_GetEntity" name="GetEntity" href=""></xref> on the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 호출 하 여 반환 된 스트림이 <xref uid="langword_csharp_GetEntity" name="GetEntity" href=""> </xref> 은 기본 <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If a type other than <xref:System.IO.Stream> is specified, the method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이외의 형식을 경우 <xref:System.IO.Stream>지정 하면 메서드가 반환 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: ofObjectToReturn is neither nor a type.
trans-unit.target: ofObjectToReturn가 아닌 또는 유형입니다.

trans-unit.source: The specified URI is not an absolute URI.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 URI는 절대 URI가 아닙니다.

trans-unit.source: absoluteUri is .
trans-unit.target: absoluteUriis .

trans-unit.source: There is a runtime error (for example, an interrupted server connection).
trans-unit.target: 런타임 오류 (예를 들어 중단 된 서버 연결)입니다.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously maps a URI to an object that contains the actual resource.
trans-unit.target: 실제 리소스가 포함 된 개체로 URI를 비동기적으로 매핑합니다.

trans-unit.source: The URI returned from <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.ResolveUri*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.ResolveUri*>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.ResolveUri*> 에서 반환 된 URI

trans-unit.source: Currently not used.
trans-unit.target: 현재 사용 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The type of object to return.
trans-unit.target: 반환할 개체의 형식입니다.

trans-unit.source: The current version only returns <xref:System.IO.Stream> objects.
trans-unit.target: 현재 버전에만 반환 <xref:System.IO.Stream>개체입니다.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The stream returned by calling <xref uid="langword_csharp_GetEntity" name="GetEntity" href=""></xref> on the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 호출 하 여 반환 된 스트림이 <xref uid="langword_csharp_GetEntity" name="GetEntity" href=""> </xref> 은 기본 <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If a type other than <xref:System.IO.Stream> is specified, the method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이외의 형식을 경우 <xref:System.IO.Stream>지정 하면 메서드가 반환 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Resolves the absolute URI from the base and relative URIs by calling <xref uid="langword_csharp_ResolveUri" name="ResolveUri" href=""></xref> on the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본 및 상대 Uri에서 절대 URI를 호출 하 여 확인 <xref uid="langword_csharp_ResolveUri" name="ResolveUri" href=""> </xref> 은 기본 <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The base URI used to resolve the relative URI.
trans-unit.target: 기본 URI는 상대 URI를 확인 하는 데 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The URI to resolve.
trans-unit.target: 확인할 URI입니다.

trans-unit.source: The URI can be absolute or relative.
trans-unit.target: 절대 또는 상대 URI 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: If absolute, this value effectively replaces the `baseUri` value.
trans-unit.target: 경우 절대이 값이 대체는 `baseUri` 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: If relative, it combines with the `baseUri` to make an absolute URI.
trans-unit.target: 경우 상대와 결합 하 여는 `baseUri` 를 절대 URI를 확인 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The absolute URI or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the relative URI cannot be resolved (returned by calling <xref uid="langword_csharp_ResolveUri" name="ResolveUri" href=""></xref> on the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>).
trans-unit.target: 절대 URI 또는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> 상대 URI를 확인할 수 없는 경우 (호출 하 여 반환 <xref uid="langword_csharp_ResolveUri" name="ResolveUri" href=""> </xref> 은 기본 <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>).

trans-unit.source: relativeUri is .
trans-unit.target: relativeUriis .
